extension.walkthrough.started.title: Work with ChatGPT
extension.walkthrough.started.descriptio:
Available to ChatGPT Pro, Plus, Team, or Enterprise users.

Enable ChatGPT to read contents in your editor and help answer questions.
extension.walkthrough.started.install.ti: Get the ChatGPT Desktop App for macOS
extension.walkthrough.started.install.de:
The desktop app is required for this extension.
[Download ChatGPT for macOS](https://persistent.oaistatic.com/sidekick/public/ChatGPT.dmg)
extension.walkthrough.started.launch.des:
Open ChatGPT from any screen on your desktop with the keyboard shortcut Option+Space.
[Open ChatGPT for macOS](command:openai.chatgpt.openChatGPTApp)
extension.walkthrough.started.pair.title: Connect ChatGPT with Visual Studio Code
extension.walkthrough.started.pair.descr:
Connect ChatGPT to Visual Studio Code by clicking the "Work with Apps" icon in the ChatGPT chat bar or by pressing Option + Space while in Visual Studio Code.
[Pair with Visual Studio Code](command:openai.chatgpt.walkthrough.pairChatGPT)
Tip: With VS Code foregrounded, press Option + Space
extension.walkthrough.started.ask.title: Ask a question about your code
extension.walkthrough.started.ask.descri:
With ChatGPT connected to Visual Studio Code, ask ChatGPT for help with your code.

ChatGPT will be able to access code in active editor panes. Select text to focus ChatGPT on specific parts of your code.
[Ask ChatGPT](command:openai.chatgpt.walkthrough.askChatGPT)
